Package harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib

Class TAward

  • java.lang.Object
    • harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib.TAward
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    public class TAward
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A TAward object has a category (AMBO = two number in a row, TERNO = three number in a row, ... up to TOMBOLA, 15 numbers matched on a card) and represent a prize that cards can win playing the game. TAward objects should be prepared before a game starts and collected in a TAwardList object, where they must be arranged in ascending order to let TGame methods work properly.
    Since:
    1.8
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Harry G. Potter harry.g.potter@gmail.com
    See Also:
    TAwardList, TGame, Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  TAward.TAwardStatus
      Possible award statuses used by TGame methods while checking is one or more cards have won an award following each number extraction.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int AMBO
      A card wins the AMBO if it is the first card on the game to match 2 numbers on the same a row.
      static int QUATERNA
      A card wins the QUATERNA if it is the first card on the game to match 4 numbers on the same a row.
      static int QUINTINA
      A card wins the QUINTINA if it is the first card on the game to match all the 5 numbers on a row.
      static int TERNO
      A card wins the TERNO if it is the first card on the game to match 3 numbers on the same a row.
      static int TOMBOLA
      A card wins the TOMBOLA if it is the first card on the game to match all the 15 numbers on the card.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TAward

        public TAward​(String label,
              int category)
       throws IllegalArgumentException
        Instantiate an award for a game. You have just to name it and associate a category to it.
        Parameters:
        label - The symbolic label identifying the award (you can use "AMBO", "TERNO", etc.).
        category - The integral score associated to each prize (2 = AMBO, 3 = TERNO, ..., 15 = TOMBOLA). Valid values are within the [2,15] range.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException

      • TAward

        public TAward​(String label,
              int category,
              BigDecimal value,
              String extraInfo)
        Instantiate an award for a game. You have just to name it and associate a category to it.
        Parameters:
        label - The symbolic label identifying the award (you can use "AMBO", "TERNO", etc.).
        category - The integral score associated to each prize (2 = AMBO, 3 = TERNO, ..., 15 = TOMBOLA). Valid values are within the [2,15] range.
        value - a numeric (monetary?) value associated
        extraInfo - a free string where to store addition info for the award.

        public int getConflictOrdinal()

      • getWinnerList

        public List<TCard> getWinnerList()
        To properly manage winners during a tombola game, to each award is associated a list of cards that, as the game progresses, will maintain references to the card or the cards winning the award. And... yes, the list is needed because more than "a single card" can be associated to an award. In Italy, if two players hit a prize (say TERNO) after the extraction of the same number, usually they can decide to divide (that is, "spartimm") the prize.
        Returns:
        the list of card(s) considered winner(s) of this prize
        See Also:
        TGame.resolveCandidates(int)

      • getCandidatesList

        public List<TCard> getCandidatesList()
        Helping list used to maintain cards hitting the score for the award while checking all the playing cards within a game (@linkplain TGame}. When all cards have been checked after a number extraction, the candidateList is been used by invoking the TGame.resolveCandidates(int) method to choose one or more final winner for the award.
        Returns:
        the current list of cards candidate to be assigned the award.
        See Also:
        TGame, TGame.extractNumber(int)

      • getValidatingList

        public List<TCard> getValidatingList()
        Return the list of cards waiting to be explicitly accepted or denied to contend for a tombola award. To be used when TGame.setConfirmCandidateOn(boolean) is set to true. Return null is the award isn't in VALIDATING status.
        Returns:
        the list of cards waiting to be explicitly accepted or denied to contend for a tombola award. Null is the award isn't in VALIDATING status.

      • accept

        public boolean accept​(TCard card)
        When TGame.setConfirmCandidateOn(boolean) is set to true, this method allows to explicitly verify and accept a Card candidate for a tombola award. Return true is the card has been properly accepted, false if the card is not in the validating list for this award. If there are no more card to validate after the last number extraction (see TGame.extractNumber(int)) the award status is also changed from VALIDATING to CONTENDED.
        Parameters:
        card - the TCard object that should be present in the current "validating" List for this award.
        Returns:
        true if the card has been validated, false if it is not present in the validating list or the award is not in VALIDATING status.

      • deny

        public boolean deny​(TCard card)
        When TGame.setConfirmCandidateOn(boolean) is set to true, this method allows to explicitly verify and DENY a Card candidate for a tombola award. Return true is the card has been effectively denied, false if the card is not in the validating list for this award. If there are no more card to validate after the last number extraction (see TGame.extractNumber(int)) the award status is also changed from VALIDATING to CONTENDED.
        Parameters:
        card - the TCard object that should be present in the current "validating" List for this award.
        Returns:
        true if the card has been denied, false if it is not present in the validating list or the award is not in VALIDATING status.

      • getWithJollyList

        public List<Boolean> getWithJollyList()
        If a card wins this award using also its Jolly Number, that is is put also in this list.
        Returns:
        the list containing all the cards that have been assigned this award AND have won it using also their Jolly number.

      • isAvailable

        public boolean isAvailable()
        Helping method, return true if the award is still AVAILABLE to be won by a card
        Returns:
        true if the award is still AVAILABLE to be won by a card

        Returns:
        true if the award has already been won by a card

      • isContended

        public boolean isContended()
        Helping method, return true if the award actually is contended by two or more cards hitting needed score after the extraction of the same number.
        Returns:
        true if the award actually is contended by two or more cards hitting needed score after the same extraction
